features.name: LinkedIn service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for LinkedIn service

features.name: LinkedIn response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: LinkedIn CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

features.name: LinkedIn service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string

features.name: LinkedIn uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field

features.name: LinkedIn valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401

features.name: LinkedIn missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401

features.name: LinkedIn invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401

features.name: LinkedIn malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx

features.name: LinkedIn token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected

features.name: LinkedIn auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field

features.name: LinkedIn OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header

features.name: LinkedIn auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401

features.name: Search LinkedIn profiles
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/search with query returns profile array

features.name: Get LinkedIn profile
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/profile/:identifier returns name, headline, company

features.name: Send LinkedIn connection request
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/connect with profileUrl returns success=true

features.name: Send LinkedIn message
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/message with profileUrl+text returns success=true

features.name: Get LinkedIn connections list
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/connections returns connection array

features.name: Get LinkedIn DM conversations
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/dm/conversations returns array

features.name: AI-generate LinkedIn message
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/ai-message with context returns generated_message string

features.name: Run LinkedIn prospecting pipeline
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/prospect-pipeline with niche returns prospects array

features.name: Get outreach stats
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/outreach-stats returns sent, replied, conversion_rate

features.name: Get pending connection requests
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/pending-connections returns array with count

features.name: Get LinkedIn rate limits
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/rate-limits returns daily used + limit

features.name: Navigate to LinkedIn profile
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/navigate with profileUrl opens profile

features.name: Run outreach campaign
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/campaign with prospects array sends messages in sequence

features.name: Score prospect with ICP criteria
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/score with profile returns score 0-100 + reasoning

features.name: Get company info from profile
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/profile/:id includes company, role, seniority

features.name: Search with filters
features.description: POST /api/linkedin/search with title+company filters returns filtered results

features.name: Get InMail credits remaining
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/credits returns inmail_credits remaining

features.name: Withdraw connection request
features.description: DELETE /api/linkedin/connect/:requestId returns success=true

features.name: Get profile followers/connections count
features.description: GET /api/linkedin/profile/:id includes connection_count

features.name: Check active hours guard
features.description: POST with force=false during inactive hours returns 429 or queued state

features.name: LinkedIn missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: LinkedIn empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: LinkedIn null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: LinkedIn wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx

features.name: LinkedIn extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: LinkedIn SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: LinkedIn XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: LinkedIn service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header

features.name: LinkedIn timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout

features.name: LinkedIn duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate

features.name: LinkedIn invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: LinkedIn error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json

features.name: LinkedIn stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: LinkedIn connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag

features.name: LinkedIn method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header

features.name: LinkedIn unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: LinkedIn RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: LinkedIn newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: LinkedIn zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: LinkedIn URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: LinkedIn very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: LinkedIn duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: LinkedIn numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: LinkedIn pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page

features.name: LinkedIn pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404

features.name: LinkedIn rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining

features.name: LinkedIn 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After

features.name: LinkedIn Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0

features.name: LinkedIn rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again

features.name: LinkedIn concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors

features.name: LinkedIn daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field

features.name: LinkedIn force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes

features.name: LinkedIn DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table

features.name: LinkedIn no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row

features.name: LinkedIn timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string

features.name: LinkedIn platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name

features.name: LinkedIn contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table

features.name: LinkedIn conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync

features.name: LinkedIn message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync

features.name: LinkedIn RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds

features.name: LinkedIn SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content

features.name: LinkedIn failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted

features.name: LinkedIn AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string

features.name: LinkedIn AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit

features.name: LinkedIn AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field

features.name: LinkedIn AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503

features.name: LinkedIn AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms

features.name: LinkedIn AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range

features.name: LinkedIn AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array

features.name: LinkedIn AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error

features.name: LinkedIn MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: LinkedIn tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: LinkedIn tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: LinkedIn tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: LinkedIn MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: LinkedIn tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: LinkedIn sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: LinkedIn unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: LinkedIn tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: LinkedIn MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: LinkedIn session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: LinkedIn session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: LinkedIn expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: LinkedIn close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: LinkedIn list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: LinkedIn p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: LinkedIn 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: LinkedIn large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: LinkedIn streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: LinkedIn cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
